CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- local HideUI= _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/윷놀이맵EndGameUI") local MoveUI= _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/로비로 이동합니다.") HideUI:SetEnable(false) MoveUI:SetEnable(true) wait(5) MoveUI:SetEnable(false) self.Entity.PlayerComponent:MoveToMapPosition('end',Vector2(2,2))
